block_comment: The code block generates a Output Buffer (OBUFT) for a DDR3 memory type. This is conditional as determined by an if statement which checks the variable C_MEM_TYPE for being "DDR3". The OBUFT is named "iob_rst", with three port connections; (1) Output to "mcbx_dram_ddr3_rst", (2) Input from "ioi_rst", and (3) it uses tristate control "t_rst".
